It all starts with the seed. Seed banking specialist. Project development.
It all starts with the seed. Seed banking specialist. Project development.
3mo • 
 
3 months ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Here at the Joseph Rock Arboretum in Hawaii we try to be very thoughtful about waste. One thing that we do is to use all of the cardboard from boxes to plant our seedlings in the field. We have a machine that perforates the cardboard and we use it around the seedlings. 

You can see it around this sandalwood seedling. It keeps the weeds suppressed, keeps the soil cool around the young plant, and the worms like it. It finally breaks down. I also shred my paper in the office so my paper waste is very low.
…more

Founder & CEO Coco Clean
Founder & CEO Coco Clean
Complete Big Pesticide Propaganda BS 

The complete premise is absurd “scientist finally identified the culprit“. How does one explain that virtually every other winged insect species such as butterflies, native bumblebees moths ,ladybugs etc have seen their their species numbers crash by 75% in the last 50 years based on scientific reporting from across the world.

Such winged bugs don’t have mite issues 

This screaming headline serves as a nice backdrop for the continued poisoning of nature and humans, vis-à-vis Bayer, Monsanto, Syngenta via their toxic pesticides.
